casebody.data:
Swift, surviving partner, v. Mott et al. There was no abuse of discretion in the first grant of a new trial. April 10, 1893.

Argued at the last term.

Complaint on note. Before Judge Willis. City •court of Columbus. April term, 1892. Goetci-iius & Chappell, for plaintiff'. L. E. Garrard, Tol. Craweord and Blandeord & ■Grimes, for defendants.

Judgment affirmed.
